name: Get 'JAG'gy With It Quiz | Television | 20 Questions

questions.text: What does JAG stand for?
questions.explanation:
Judge Advocate General.

	'JAG' was created by Donald P. Bellasario in 1995 and is a mix between the Tom Cruise movies 'Top Gun' and 'A Few Good Men'. In the spring of 1997, CBS picked up 'JAG' and has carried it to this day.

questions.text: Was Bud Roberts, JR. introduced in the first season?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Bud was introduced in the pilot episode and was also in 'Skeleton Crew' which was not aired on NBC due to cancellation.

questions.text: What did Boone say Harm's stepfather did for a living?
questions.explanation:
car salesman.

	Harm's stepfather, Frank, is played by John Cypher. Frank owns a car company.

questions.text: Who was the first partner that viewers saw with Harm?
questions.explanation:
Kate.

	FYI, Andrea Parker went on to play Ms. Parker in the NBC show 'The Pretender' after the pilot episode of 'JAG'. She appeared for three episodes of 'JAG' after the pilot episode. Now she plays on the ABC sitcom 'Less Than Perfect'.

questions.text: Is Harriet's family rich?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Bud discovered this in the episode 'Yesterday's Heroes'.

questions.text: What is the name of Bud's sister?
questions.explanation:
Winnie.

	Bud never mentioned Winnie Roberts again after the second season.

questions.text: What character did Catherine Bell play in the first season of 'JAG'?
questions.explanation:
Diane Schonke.

	FYI, Catherine Bell's scene in 'Skeleton Crew' lasted exactly one minute. After 'JAG'was brought back, DPB brought back Catherine after a letter she wrote asking for the part of Sara Mackenzie.

questions.text: When Harm returned to flight status, what was his call sign before it was changed to Hammer?
questions.explanation:
Pappy.

	Shortly before he left the 'USS Patrick Henry', the crew gave him a helmet with the call sign Hammer on it. Hammer was his father's call sign.

questions.text: What does AJ stand for?
questions.explanation:
Albert Jethro.

	This was revealed when Bud and Harriet told AJ they were going to call their first child after him.

questions.text: What familial reference did Chloe use to describe Mac when Bud first met her in 'Jaggle Bells'?
questions.explanation:
mom.

	Chloe Madison is Mac's 'little sister'.

questions.text: Who delivered Bud and Harriet's first child?
questions.explanation:
AJ.

	This occurred in the episode, 'Yeah, Baby'.

questions.text: In 'Father's Day', what dynamic duo were Harm and Mac referred to as?
questions.explanation:
Batman and Robin.

	Harm: "I'm Batman."

questions.text: What episode was never shown because the series was cancelled in 1996?
questions.explanation:
'Skeleton Crew'.

	USA aired the episode in 1999.

questions.text: What episode did Harm and Mac first kiss?
questions.explanation:
'Death Watch'.

	Mac (after the kiss): "I know you were kissing her." She was referring to Lt. Schonke.

questions.text: What holiday did Lt. Harmon Rabb, Sr. go MIA?
questions.explanation:
Christmas Eve, 1969.

	Harm was five years old. When he was sixteen, he went to Vietnam to search for his dad. In 1998, Harm and Mac went to Russia and found out that Harm, Sr. had been shot and killed.

questions.text: Mic Brumby proposed to Mac.
questions.explanation:
True.

	In 'Boomerang pt 2', Mic proposed to Mac in his dress uniform while they were on the ferry. Mac put the ring on her right hand until she was ready to accept his proposal.

questions.text: What did Harm tell Mac to use to get her stuck engagement ring off her left hand?
questions.explanation:
shampoo.

	This occurred at the beginning of the episode 'People vs. Gunny'.

questions.text: Harm and Mac are the godparents of little AJ.
questions.explanation: True.

questions.text: When Mac told Harm she had a bag of clothes in the trunk of her car, what did he say Navy officers kept in the trunk of their cars?
questions.explanation:
golf clubs.

	This conversation was held in 'We The People'.

questions.text: Harm's ex-girlfriend, Jordan, was murdered.
questions.explanation:
True.

	This occurred in the episode 'Past Tense'. FYI, Susan Haskell is now the proud mother of a baby girl with boyfriend Thorsten Kaye (Ian, PC).
